review_body: Easiest best photo enhancement app This is by far the best photo enhancement app I have ever used. It is so much better than anything else I have ever seen in automatically and intelligently making your photos BETTER not just different that there really is nothing else out there that even comes close. When I see the lower reviews I realized that sometimes the reviews are just worthless. This isn‚Äôt a goofy Snapchat filter. It‚Äôs a serious digital portrait enhancement. Nothing else comes close.

Great Self-Picture Taking Application I saw this app when I was browsing through the Microsoft apps and I thought that I would download it and offer my thoughts after using it for a little while. I must admit that I am pleasantly surprised with how easy, successful and interesting this app has proven to be. I think this is one of those must-have apps for anyone that frequently takes pictures of themselves or with other people. The simple, subtle and noticeable difference that the Microsoft selfie app offers in comparison to a normal selfie generated from the iOS default camera is astonishing. I would recommend this app to everyone. Well done, Microsoft.
Turns volume down So far it works as advertised on my iPhone 8 Plus and I haven‚Äôt had any issues except one. I had iTunes running in the background and this app turned the volume all the way down.

Made me squeal for some reason Upon seeing the 3 star review I was somewhat skeptical that it was going to be anything worth getting. However it IS Microsoft and they know what they're doing. Normally I think I look horrible in photos, especially selfies. But when I used the apps features and compared it to the original I actually squealed because it was actually REALLY GOOD. That's kinda weird cause I'm a guy but still it's a good app

Could the magic extend down to my neck? I thought this still didn‚Äôt work (file selection from camera roll or other places), but figured out it was something disabled in restrictions in settings- photos couldn‚Äôt be accessed by other apps under privacy.  I love üíï what the editor is capable of! Looked as if I had an eye job & laser facial. Wish it would extend to the neck area? Thanks!!

Needs to be updated There is a bug in this version (2.2.0) that will not let you select a picture. It tells you to go authorize access to photos in settings/Microsoft selphie, but that is not an available option.

Microsoft Strikes Again I appreciate that Microsoft is really trying to develop a lot of apps for iOS. They have really upped their game with apps for Office 365, but they also have simple apps like this. I appreciate that this is a very simple selfie app. No bells and whistles. It just takes selfies and then tries to smooth out any minor skin issues. (If you need a full-functioned photo editor, go with something like Google's Snapseed. This is not it.) Keep up the good work, Microsoft!

iPhone update struggles I love this app and use it to quickly edit my photos; however, the app seems to be struggling with the new iPhone update. It tells me I need to give access to my photo library, but under settings that option isn‚Äôt even available for their app. Not to mention, I‚Äôm able to open my photo library in the app, it just won‚Äôt let me select a picture.

Please fix iOS 11 photo issue. Before updating to iOS 11 Microsoft Selfie was my favorite photo editing app. I NEVER take a photo in the app, only use it to edit apps from my camera roll, but after updating to iOS 11 I can no longer access photos from my camera roll. It gives a pop-up ‚ÄúGo to Settings > Microsoft Selfie > Photos‚Äù to give app permission to access photos except there‚Äôs no photo option there! Only camera. So please Microsoft correct this issue so my review can go from two to five stars.

Doesn‚Äôt Work With iOS11 I used to love this app. But since the iOS11 update, can‚Äôt give the app access to photos anymore. It says to enable access in Settings, but no such settings exist in new iOS update. I‚Äôm very disappointed. I realize this is probably Apple‚Äôs fault, and I‚Äôve contacted them about it already (to no avail). But I wish Microsoft app developers would put a little pressure on Apple as well, or at least configure a way around this problem.

So easy, fantasy results Make any picture look great with this simple app! And those pictures you took in the past that didn't turn out right- this app fixes those! So happy with this app! Thanks MICROSOFT!

Better Than You Think I first thought this app would be pointless, but I still decided to try it. I made the right choice this make photos look so much better. If you like to take pictures I definitely recommend this app.

Great app needs update or else useless now Needs to support new version for the IPhone. Needs settings for photo privileges for the App. Right now you have to point and shoot with the app. It was working awesome until now.
Please update !! This is my go-to app for editing pics but like many of the other reviewers, I cannot edit existing pictures w. giving the app permission, but that is nowhere to be found.
iOS 11 update issue I can‚Äôt access it due to the recent update just like the other reviewers and I‚Äôm terribly upset please fix this issue otherwise your app is 5 stars in my book !!!!

Please fix this! This used to be my favorite app for quick edits. Now I cannot open an existing photo in the app, there‚Äôs no option to give it permission in settings. Okay, fine, I snapped a few pics using the app and did the edits there. Saves to camera roll fine. BUT when I try to edit this pictures later in the photos app (specifically crop them), the photos app crashes! This only happens in photos taken with Microsoft Selfie.

No longer works with iOS 11 I used to love this app but since updating my iPhone to iOS 11 I am no longer able to edit photos stored in my phone‚Äôs gallery. As others have said, this option is not even available to enable in settings, though the app prompts you to do so. Very disappointing and frustrating. Please fix this problem so I can give this app 5 stars!

Love this!! This is by far the best selfie app I‚Äôve used. It just works. I don‚Äôt have to do a bunch of different things to make the photo look great. It just does! Live the ease of use and how my photos look. Only app I use anymore.

unfinished. lacks support for brown faces. this app works like a very early beta that shouldn't be released to the public. I'm 19, and I have a pretty face. this thing airbrushes me to the point where it's comical: Google "airbrushed Adam Sandler" and you'll see what I mean. I also happen to be brown - on the lighter end of the spectrum, as far as brownness goes, but definitely not fair by white/"Caucasian" measures. this app doesn't work with my skin tone. it lightens my face beyond recognition and leaves it unmatching with the rest of my body. your developers should be smart enough to know that paler face =/= better photo. basically, 90% of the photos I've tried look better before I run them through.

Easy, Simple, and Effective This app is extremely user-friendly and it really does make your pictures more flattering! I think that the new icon is much more appealing to a general audience, but the previous icon was definitely more unique and memorable. Microsoft, I would recommend something that's unique and doesn't necessarily have a camera as the icon - that's old! The cute face was a refreshing change, but not good for everybody. A compromise??

Reminds me of one of my favorites... My favorite "facial cleanup" app of all time is "moreBeaute2".  The default "Natural" filter works just like that app.  I appreciate that it also works on existing photos and not just new selfies.  Since I'm not sure if moreBeaute2 is supported/updated anymore, I appreciate having this as an alternative.  Thanks Microsoft!
3D Touch Support + Integration with 3rd Parties Hi,

11/10 IGN I'm usually not the most comfortable person when taking selfies, but I'm starting to finally become one with my annoying Instagram friends now that I have Microsoft Selfie! But in all serious, I really do like this app; as it makes my pictures look a lot better than before.

Love it! Love this app! Curious as to why some pics in my photo album don't edit though. Only complaint/suggestion would be that the back button, after selecting a photo to edit in my album, would lead me back to the photo album rather than back to the "take a pic, select a pic" page. I would like to be able to view the photo in full so that I don't have to go all the way back to it. Just seems that would be the most efficient option.

PHENOMENAL APP...for my gf lol I really like this app, it cleans me up pretty well, a little bit too well. Sure my blemishes and stuff get taken off but so does a little of my facial hair??? Interesting feature, it makes me look like a baby lol. Would love to see a gender button maybe?? My gf's face looks more pretty with it, as if she had foundation. I however do not need that, and would like my facial hair back. AWESOME APP THOUGH KEEP THE UPDATES COMING!!!

I love the app but I don't like the new icon I really enjoyed the old icon for this app and it really made my apps looks great with that icon now this new icon looks like goggle I dislike this icon but in general the app is amazing  hopefully we can get more features like more filters and everything and another update icon for the app

Great app! Miss the old icon Love this app. Best selfie enhancer! The old app icon was better though. It was cute and unique! And more relevant to a selfie app. The new one looks too much like every other photo app icon with a camera lens. I know the app is Microsoft, it's in the name, don't need the app icon to reflect this. Sorry but the new icon is generic and boring üëé
Awesome app!!! I've been using the iPhone since they came out and this may be only the second or third time I've felt a review is worthwhile.
New icon is good That old icon with the person's face was annoying to see on my phone everyday. Thank you for changing it.

Pretty good Works as you'd expect. Its a plain and simple selfie app with various filters. Has a light and dark theme mode for the app. Also has an option to turn off auto noise reduction. Can save and share photos to Facebook and other social networks. It could probably benefit from some more customization options for the photos.

Great start to a great app It basically is like the "beautify" setting on a lot of cameras, but this does it in a better way. The different filters, being able to adjust how intense you want it, and the overall job it does are amazing. If only it had 3D Touch support! And the ability to add more than one filter.

Good and needs improvement UI is clean and simple to use, but I would like to have the ability to set the opening page straight to the camera mode. Also I would like to have the option to use the volume button as the shutter button just like the default camera app
Beautifully simple! This app doesn't have many features, just filters and exposure settings, but they make any picture look attractive, especially when you use the app multiple times for one picture.

Perfect! Very simple app, can touch up photos I wasn't able to do manually and generally doesn't look too airbrushed! It does have the option to tone down if you think the edit is too strong. It makes your photos look good, yet still very natural. I love it!

10/10 This app is so good! the only small problem is that when you click on a photo and you put pressure on it with the 3D touch , the app closes. All in all this app makes your photos look in a much better quality.

So amazing!! This is super simple and easy to use! I love how it brightens your pictures up to make you look amazing, but it doesn't change TOO much and you can choose how much you want changed with a scale from 1-10. Anyway, amazing app and I'll be using it a lot! üòÑ

So Good, It's like Magic Absolutely love this app... It clears alway all blemishes and airbrushes the pic to perfection! Best photo editor ever! Love the results, it's almost magical how the autocorrect nails it to perfection each time!!
Great! But... The app is actually really neat, it's almost like the perfect airbrush. It Also does wonders with Contrast and brightness.

Good free app This app is really good at making you look perfect, for a free app. You should definitely try it, and if you think it looks too fake you can turn down or intensity. It's a very simple app, and only does one thing, but it does it pretty well.

I want the old icon back! I liked the old icon more. As for the performance of the app, it's nice. It makes people who are darker look airbrushed in an extremely obvious way. I would say I'm golden or honey colored, and I might be too dark to use this app. Also, I wish there would be an option to remove blemishes before the airbrushing takes place. I wanted to use this app because I do have skin problems, and it just blurs my acne. It's still so noticeable.

Great for Simple Editing The app comes with 14 filters and allows you to either upload or take a photo, choose a filter, gauge the intensity and then save it back to our camera roll. Very simple for people who don't know how to utilize exposure/saturation/white balance etc.

Amazing and Works Perfectly! Pretty cool app that automatically adjusts the filters, lighting,etc to give you the best photo of your face. I'll be using this all the time, even downloaded for my wife too who's a selfie queen!

Phenomenal app I've used this app to clean up existing pictures from a recent NYC visit.  This app makes pics on the iPhone look fantastic - I can't believe it's a free app!!  Try it, you will love what it does to your pictures.

Simply Amazing This is a perfect example of an app done right. Microsoft Selfie give you quick access to filters that make you look great even on your worst days. It's now my go-to app when taking a self-portrait. Awesome

This is glorified filters This does quite literally nothing that hundreds, if not thousands, of other apps do. It is glorified filter application and insane uncontrolled editing. Sure, you can change the strength of the editing, but it takes away everything that makes someone human (the little lines, small scars, freckles...). After trying a few pictures, I promptly deleted. If I wanted to look like a robot, there are better options.
Decent Fairly simple app which works well for cleaning up skin blemishes and decent filters, but for some reason my photos are reverse image and there is no setting to change that.

Best selfie app! I'm not really one to take selfies, but if I do, it's nice to have this app to use. You can just a bit of effect or go all out but even then it's not over the top. I like how you can also edit photos you've already taken.

BEST SELFIE CAMERA! If I'm needing my front facing camera for a selfie, I go to this app first. If I ever forget, I upload a selfie from within the app to adjust. Even when I have morning face, it makes me look like a million bucks. So you should get it. I promise you, it's THE BEST!!!!

icon üò©üò©üò© Youre honestly crazy if you think im updating the app for that ugly icon. It just looks so generic now. I mean i understand your logo needs to be there but the old one was better! It was honestly the cutest. Even if you guys come out with new things im still not updating 'til you guys change it back üòÇüò©üôÑüôÑ
Easy This is an awesome app to simply give life to many bland pictures people often take. T is easy to use. No need for overly complicated settings.
